author: cnbc.com
title: Victoria Muntean to Lead Kinsale’s Products Liability Division
text:
RICHMOND, Va., Kinsale Capital Group, Inc. (NASDAQ:KNSL) – Kinsale Insurance Company today announced Victoria Muntean’s promotion to Division Manager, Products Liability, effective March 1, 2018. Patrick L. Dalton, Vice President, Casualty Underwriting, stated, “Victoria helped establish Kinsale’s Products Liability Division in 2012. Since that time she has played a pivotal role in the growth and success of the Division. We have great confidence in Victoria’s ability to further build and enhance our product’s platform.”
Ms. Muntean has held several underwriting positions of increasing responsibility in Kinsale’s casualty divisions. She earned a Bachelor of Arts degree from the University of Virginia. In addition, she has earned the Chartered Property Casualty Underwriter (CPCU) and Associate in Surplus Lines Insurance (ASLI) designations from The Institutes.
Ms. Muntean is an employee of Kinsale Management, Inc., the management services company of Kinsale Capital Group, Inc. Products Liability is a division of Kinsale Insurance Company, a subsidiary of Kinsale Capital Group.
About Kinsale Capital Group, Inc.
Kinsale Capital Group, Inc. is a specialty insurance group headquartered in Richmond, Virginia, focusing on the excess and surplus lines market.
